extension.summary: The Motivational, Revolutionary 24-Hour TV and Radio Network
extension.description: Welcome to KOTF UrbanFire Television, a comprehensive Moorish American (Black/ African-American) network dedicated to our media, our products and services, and our people. Here, Moorish content providers and advertisers will have a unique forum to share their content and products and services with millions around the world through television for a nominal fee. The content will receive a fresh face and renewed vigor, venturing away from the saturated and fragmented YouTube corner. An added feature will include cutting-edge entertainment news to educate and empower individuals with their careers. We are the new best friend for aspiring Moorish/ Black/ African-American content creators and entrepreneurs!
